bookmark.name: active
bookmark.query: last_report > "35 minutes ago" and (status.applied > 0 or status.restarted > 0)

bookmark.name: error
bookmark.query: last_report > "35 minutes ago" and (status.failed > 0 or status.failed_restarts > 0 or status.skipped > 0)

bookmark.name: out of sync
bookmark.query: last_report < "30 minutes ago" and status.enabled = true
